entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash: Window was already deactivated #22406
  • Rewrite TableView handlers so they aren't based on ListViewRenderers #22405
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Improper Insert Behavior on ListView for Windows #22393
  • Right To Left flow direction is not applied to the ListView on the Mac and iOS platforms. #22391
  • [MAUI] [WinUI] App crashes when using the startup task ability #22387
  • [WinUI] Application.Current.CloseWindow Crash When AppWindow.Hide is called in .Net Maui 9.0 Prev 3 #22386
    9.0-preview5
  • Epic: Add new SetBinding API for defining "compiled" bindings in code #22384
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • Cannot update maui workload. #22407
  • RadioButton TextColor doesn't change iOS/MacCatalyst #19943
  • Two radio buttons in group - set is checked of one of them in run time not worked #8971
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex
  • [arcade] Move to arcade 8.0 for main #22400
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Update to net9 preview5 #22399
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor

Merged

  • Add (back) VSMac feedback tool mention when move-to-vs-feedback label is applied #22385
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Update policy/workflow automation to use new area labels #22410
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump issue Template to include SR5 #22408
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area-drawing, area-controls-border
  • Fix null handling in UpdateIndicatorLayout method (#22361) #22382
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add provisioning mono back #22395
  • [release/9.0.0-preview4] Update versions #22392

Updated

  • Fix frame ping #22347
    area-layout
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    community ✨, stale, area-controls-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area-templates
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • [Trimming] Add ILC compilation test of all assemblies #22328
    area-publishing
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-perf, t/perf
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    area-drawing, community ✨, t/perf
  • MenuItem gets updated when IconImageSource changes - Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨, area-controls-menubar, stale, t/desktop, Under Consideration
